pageHeader.description: Efficiera comes with a comprehensive AI software suite that allows you to compile AI models and implement AI applications in production environments

lead.title: Software Development Kit Optimized for Quantized Models, Bringing AI to Practical Use
lead.text1: For using Efficiera, software plays a pivotal role. Addressing the quantization of neural network becomes a critical concern.
lead.text2: However, most neural network frameworks do not support extremely low bit quantization by default. Hence, it is necessary to implement a quantizer for the neural network
lead.text3: It also requires implementing a proprietary AI model compiler for Efficiera, and designing its own network architecture to maximize the performance. For Efficiera, the software is as important as the hardware.
lead.text4: LeapMind provides a comprehensive software suite that automatically optimizes these processes.

lists.item1: Operator library for Extremely low bit quantization model
Converted to Efficiera executable instruction format
lists.item3: Parallelization of data transfers and operations

lists.item2: Run state management of multiple models

lists.item1: The only environment capable of developing deep learning models for Extremely low bit quantization
lists.item2: Libraries for deep learning frameworks, defining operators that can be executed by Efficiera and Runtime Library
lists.item3: Models can be built without special attention to the operators required for learning the quantization and scaling coefficients, which is a feature of Extremely low bit quantization.
lists.item4: Utilize PyTorch functionality, such as visualization with TensorBoard, without modification
lists.item5: Export study results in ONNX format

lists.item1: Ubuntu 18.04 or 20.04 environment with CUDA-enabled GPU
The only tool capable of converting an Extremely low bit quantized deep learning model into an instruction for Efficiera
lists.item2: Convert ONNX format learned and exported using Efficiera NDK into a sequence of instructions that Efficiera IP can execute

item3.title: Advanced optimization to meet resource and memory bandwidth constraints for specified Efficiera configurations

lists.item1: High speed by parallel execution of data transfer and arithmetic operations
lists.item2: Power saving by reduced memory access

item4.title: Estimate the number of execution cycles, memory bandwidth, and memory usage for a given Efficiera configuration

lists.item1: Efficiera configurations can be selected to suit the size and structure of the model
Runtime library for applications that maximize the performance of Efficiera-equipped hardware
lists.item2: Provides API to execute the instruction sequence output from Efficiera Converter on the target
lists.item3: Capable of managing correspondence between multiple deep learning models, Efficiera instances, and CPU threads
lists.item4: Accelerated by CPU SIMD instructions when available
lists.item5: Define APIs for C++ and Python
lists.item6: Simulators on the host environment are also provided, allowing application development even when the target is not yet complete.

lists.item1: Target (actual device): Ubuntu environment for Armv8-A AArch64 and Armv7-A processors
lists.item2: Host: Ubuntu 18.04 environment for Intel 64/AMD64 processors
